dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine coverage of intensive care units ICUs is an organizational innovation that has been touted as a means to improve access to and quality of critical care The purpose of this narrative review is to discuss the different organizational models of ICU telemedicine and factors that have influenced its adoption and to review the existing literature to consider whether it has lived up to its promise We conclude by suggesting future directions to fill in some of the existing gaps in the evidence
Annals of the American Thoracic Society
Telemedicine Coverage of Intensive Care Units: A Narrative Review.
